headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP in Deadline
content: If youâ€™re looking for your two-wheeled action to be a little more futuristic and a lot more explosive, perhaps cutting your foes off and vaporizing them with the light trail behind your Nagasaki Shotaro is more your speed. If you needed anymore motivation to obliterate your nemeses, Deadline is paying double rewards out to all competitors this week.
